item.title: URLs are harder than they should be
item.description: My current toy web-app is a webmail client. It provides the standard inbox view and then letâ€™s you drill down to view actual mails. I also then have actions you can perform on these. The URLs for these are fairly basic: /mailbox/<ID> /mailbox/<ID>/<mail ID> /mailbox/<ID>/<mail ID>/delete So far, so whatever. The pain comes with how to construct the drill down urls from the current page. I can get the current URL in my templates with request.
